actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Appropriations.

official_title: Providing for the continued operation of the government in the absence of appropriations, and for other purposes.

summary.text: Provides that the operations of an agency of the U.S. Government or the District of Columbia may continue for not to exceed two weeks when appropriations have not been enacted by the first of a fiscal year. Declares that existing unspent funds shall be transferable to help meet such need, subject to replenishment.

titles.title: Providing for the continued operation of the government in the absence of appropriations, and for other purposes.
